message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. It's a good deal for you in the first round.
I'm willing to give you a little more this round, but I'm still hoping for a better deal for myself.  Let's see if we can come to an agreement.
Bob, it seems we're at an impasse. Let's be practical and split it 50/50.  This offer won't get any better for you.
